SkillFeat.Name: Acrobatic
SkillFeat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on Acrobatics and Fly checks

Feat.Name: Agile Maneuvers
Feat.ShortDescription: Use your Dex bonus when calculating your CMB

Feat.Name: Under and Over
Feat.ShortDescription: Failed grapples against you cause attacker to fall prone

SkillFeat.Name: Alertness
SkillFeat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on Perception and Sense Motive checks

Feat.Name: Uncanny Alertness
Feat.ShortDescription: +1 on Perception and Sense Motive checks and a +2 bonus on saving throws against sleep and charm effects

SkillFeat.Name: Animal Affinity
SkillFeat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on Handle Animal and Ride checks

Feat.Name: Antagonize
Feat.ShortDescription: Use Diplomacy or Intimidate to goad creatures

Feat.Name: Arcane Talent
Feat.ShortDescription: Cast a 0-level spell 3 times per day as a spell-like ability

ArmorFeat.Name: Armor Proficiency, Light
ArmorFeat.ShortDescription: No penalties on attack rolls while wearing light armor

ArmorFeat.Name: Armor Proficiency, Medium
ArmorFeat.ShortDescription: No penalties on attack rolls while wearing medium armor

ArmorFeat.Name: Armor Proficiency, Heavy
ArmorFeat.ShortDescription: No penalties on attack rolls while wearing heavy armor

SkillFeat.Name: Athletic
SkillFeat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on Climb and Swim checks

Feat.Name: Blind-Fight
Feat.ShortDescription: Reroll miss chances for concealment

Feat.Name: Improved Blind-Fight
Feat.ShortDescription: Ignore miss chance for less than total concealment

Feat.Name: Greater Blind-Fight
Feat.ShortDescription: Total concealment is considered normal concealment

Feat.Name: Bludgeoner
Feat.ShortDescription: Inflict nonlethal damage with bludgeoning weapons

Feat.Name: Breadth of Experience
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on all Knowledge and Profession checks

Feat.Name: Catch Off-Guard
Feat.ShortDescription: No penalties for improvised melee weapons

Feat.Name: Improvised Weapon Mastery
Feat.ShortDescription: Make an improvised weapon deadly

Feat.Name: Charge of the Righteous
Feat.ShortDescription: You do not suffer -2 AC penalty when you charge undead or evil outsiders.

Feat.Name: Childlike
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 on Disguise checks to look like human child, take 10 on Bluff checks

Feat.Name: Combat Casting
Feat.ShortDescription: +4 bonus on concentration checks for defensive casting

Feat.Name: Uncanny Concentration
Feat.ShortDescription: Don't make concentration checks for violent movement, gain a +2 bonus on all other concentration checks

Feat.Name: Combat Expertise
Feat.ShortDescription: Trade attack bonus for AC bonus

Feat.Name: Butterfly's Sting
Feat.ShortDescription: When you confirm a critical hit you may instead deal normal damage and grant the next ally to hit the same creature with a melee attack an automatic critical hit.

Feat.Name: Gang Up
Feat.ShortDescription: Flank an opponent if at least two allies are adjacent to it

Feat.Name: Team Up
Feat.ShortDescription: Aid another as a move action with two adjacent allies

Feat.Name: Improved Dirty Trick
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on dirty trick attempts, no attack of opportunity

Feat.Name: Greater Dirty Trick
Feat.ShortDescription: Dirty trick penalty lasts 1d4 rounds

Feat.Name: Improved Disarm
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on disarm attempts, no attack of opportunity

Feat.Name: Break Guard
Feat.ShortDescription: May attack opponent you attempted to disarm with your second weapon

Feat.Name: Greater Disarm
Feat.ShortDescription: Disarmed weapons are knocked away from your enemy

Feat.Name: Disarming Strike
Feat.ShortDescription: Attempt a disarm on a successful critical hit

Feat.Name: Improved Feint
Feat.ShortDescription: Feint as a move action

Feat.Name: Deceptive Exchange
Feat.ShortDescription: Upon successful feint, you may force opponent to accept an object

Feat.Name: Disengaging Feint
Feat.ShortDescription: Feint lets you move your speed without provoking attacks of opportunity

Feat.Name: Disengaging Flourish
Feat.ShortDescription: Successful feint causes your starting square to not count as threatened

Feat.Name: Disengaging Shot
Feat.ShortDescription: When using Disengaging Feint or Disengaging Flourish, you may make a single attack

Feat.Name: Greater Feint
Feat.ShortDescription: Enemies you feint lose their Dex bonus for 1 round

Feat.Name: Passing Trick
Feat.ShortDescription: Successful acrobatics check allows you to feint

Feat.Name: Improved Reposition
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on reposition attempts, no attack of opportunity

Feat.Name: Greater Reposition
Feat.ShortDescription: Enemies you reposition provoke attacks of opportunity

Feat.Name: Repositioning Strike
Feat.ShortDescription: Attempt a reposition attack on a successful critical hit

Feat.Name: Improved Steal
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on steal attempts, no attack of opportunity

Feat.Name: Greater Steal
Feat.ShortDescription: Enemies don't notice theft until after combat

Feat.Name: Improved Trip
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on trip attempts, no attack of opportunity

Feat.Name: Binding Throw
Feat.ShortDescription: After successful Ki Throw, you may attempt to grapple

Feat.Name: Drag Down
Feat.ShortDescription: If tripped, you can attempt a trip against that foe

Feat.Name: Felling Escape
Feat.ShortDescription: Trip a foe when you break a grapple

Feat.Name: Felling Smash
Feat.ShortDescription: Trip a foe when you make a power attack

Feat.Name: Fury's Fall
Feat.ShortDescription: Add your dexterity bonus to CMB with trip attacks.

Feat.Name: Fury's Snare
Feat.ShortDescription: Entangle your opponent with trip attacks involving a whip.

Feat.Name: Greater Trip
Feat.ShortDescription: Enemies you trip provoke attacks of opportunity

Feat.Name: Ki Throw
Feat.ShortDescription: Throw opponent into adjacent square with a trip attack

Feat.Name: Improved Ki Throw
Feat.ShortDescription: Throw opponent into occupied square as a bull rush

Feat.Name: Tripping Staff
Feat.ShortDescription: Treat a quarterstaff as if it had the trip weapon special feature

Feat.Name: Tripping Twirl
Feat.ShortDescription: Use a quarterstaff to make a trip attempt against all adjacent enemies

Feat.Name: Tripping Strike
Feat.ShortDescription: Attempt a trip attack on a successful critical hit

Feat.Name: Second Chance
Feat.ShortDescription: Exchange later attacks to reroll missed first attack

Feat.Name: Improved Second Chance
Feat.ShortDescription: Take a -5 penalty on later attacks to reroll missed attack

Feat.Name: Swift Aid
Feat.ShortDescription: Attempt to aid another as a swift action

Feat.Name: Whirlwind Attack
Feat.ShortDescription: Make one melee attack against all foes within reach

Feat.Name: Combat Reflexes
Feat.ShortDescription: Make additional attacks of opportunity

Feat.Name: Bodyguard
Feat.ShortDescription: Use attack of opportunity to add a bonus to adjacent ally's AC

Feat.Name: In Harm's Way
Feat.ShortDescription: Take the damage of a successful attack upon an adjacent ally

Feat.Name: Combat Patrol
Feat.ShortDescription: Increase threatened area for attack of opportunity

Feat.Name: Stand Still
Feat.ShortDescription: Stop enemies from moving past you

Feat.Name: Teleport Tactician
Feat.ShortDescription: Teleporting creatures provoke attacks of opportunity

Feat.Name: Cornugon Shield
Feat.ShortDescription: Shield bonus to AC when wielding a spiked chain

Feat.Name: Cornugon Smash
Feat.ShortDescription: Make free Intimidate checks when you Power Attack

Feat.Name: Cornugon Stun
Feat.ShortDescription: Use Stunning Fist with special monk weapons as well as unarmed attacks

Feat.Name: Cornugon Trip
Feat.ShortDescription: May throw spiked chain to make trip attacks

Feat.Name: Critical Focus
Feat.ShortDescription: +4 bonus on attack rolls made to confirm critical hits

Feat.Name: Bleeding Critical
Feat.ShortDescription: Whenever you score a critical hit, the target takes 2d6 bleed

Feat.Name: Blinding Critical
Feat.ShortDescription: Whenever you score a critical hit, the target is blinded

Feat.Name: Crippling Critical
Feat.ShortDescription: Whenever you score a critical hit, the target's speed is halved

Feat.Name: Deafening Critical
Feat.ShortDescription: Whenever you score a critical hit, the target is deafened

Feat.Name: Sickening Critical
Feat.ShortDescription: Whenever you score a critical hit, the target is sickened

Feat.Name: Staggering Critical
Feat.ShortDescription: Whenever you score a critical hit, the target is staggered

Feat.Name: Stunning Critical
Feat.ShortDescription: Whenever you score a critical hit, the target is stunned

Feat.Name: Tiring Critical
Feat.ShortDescription: Whenever you score a critical hit, the target is fatigued

Feat.Name: Exhausting Critical
Feat.ShortDescription: Whenever you score a critical hit, the target is exhausted

Feat.Name: Dastardly Finish
Feat.ShortDescription: Deliver coup de grace to cowering or stunned target

Feat.Name: Deadly Aim
Feat.ShortDescription: Trade ranged attack bonus for damage

Feat.Name: Deadly Finish
Feat.ShortDescription: Foes you knock out must make a Fort save or die

Feat.Name: Death from Above
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain +5 bonus on attack rolls when charging from higher ground or flying

SkillFeat.Name: Deceitful
SkillFeat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on Bluff and Disguise checks

Feat.Name: Deepsight
Feat.ShortDescription: Your darkvision has a range of 120 feet

Feat.Name: Defensive Combat Training
Feat.ShortDescription: Use your total Hit Dice as your base attack bonus for CMD

Feat.Name: Defensive Weapon Training
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain +2 dodge bonus against a single fighter weapon group

SkillFeat.Name: Deft Hands
SkillFeat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on Disable Device and Sleight of Hand checks

Feat.Name: Demon Hunter
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain Knowledge and combat bonuses vs. demons

Feat.Name: Desperate Battler
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain +1 morale bonus on melee attack and damage when alone

Feat.Name: Dispel Synergy
Feat.ShortDescription: Dispel magic target takes a -2 penalty on saves

Feat.Name: Disposable Weapon
Feat.ShortDescription: Break a fragile weapon to confirm a critical hit

Feat.Name: Distance Thrower
Feat.ShortDescription: Reduce range penalties for thrown weapons by 2

Feat.Name: Dodge
Feat.ShortDescription: +1 dodge bonus to AC

Feat.Name: Close-Quarters Thrower
Feat.ShortDescription: Attacks with selected weapons do not provoke attacks of opportunity

Feat.Name: False Opening
Feat.ShortDescription: May choose to provoke attacks of opportunity, gain +4 AC vs. attacks

Feat.Name: Disorienting Maneuver
Feat.ShortDescription: After successful tumble through opponent's square, gain +2 on attack rolls vs. that opponent

Feat.Name: Mobility
Feat.ShortDescription: +4 AC against attacks of opportunity from movement

Feat.Name: Landing Roll
Feat.ShortDescription: If tripped, move 5 feet as an immediate action

Feat.Name: Shot on the Run
Feat.ShortDescription: Make ranged attack at any point during movement

Feat.Name: Parting Shot
Feat.ShortDescription: Make a ranged attack when withdrawing

Feat.Name: Sidestep
Feat.ShortDescription: Make 5-foot step immediately after an opponent misses

Feat.Name: Improved Sidestep
Feat.ShortDescription: Sidestep without using your 5-foot step on your next turn

Feat.Name: Spring Attack
Feat.ShortDescription: Move before and after melee attack

Feat.Name: Underfoot
Feat.ShortDescription: +4 on Acrobatics checks to move past larger opponents

Feat.Name: Wind Stance
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain 20% concealment if you move

Feat.Name: Lightning Stance
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain 50% concealment if you move

Feat.Name: Eclectic
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain an additional favored class

Feat.Name: Elven Accuracy
Feat.ShortDescription: Reroll miss chance due to concealment when using a bow

Feat.Name: Endurance
Feat.ShortDescription: +4 bonus on checks to avoid nonlethal damage

Feat.Name: Diehard
Feat.ShortDescription: Automatically stabilize and remain conscious below 0 hp

Feat.Name: Deathless Initiate
Feat.ShortDescription: Not Diehard; gain +2 on melee damage rolls

Feat.Name: Deathless Master
Feat.ShortDescription: Do not lose hit points while using Diehard

Feat.Name: Deathless Zealot
Feat.ShortDescription: Foes must reroll critical confirmation attacks

Feat.Name: Fast Healer
Feat.ShortDescription: Regain additional hit points when healing

Feat.Name: Drunken Brawler
Feat.ShortDescription: Take -2 penalty to Reflex saving throws but gain temporary hit points and bonuses to Fort and Will saves for 1 hr. or until temporary hit points are gone.

Feat.Name: Enforcer
Feat.ShortDescription: Demoralize opponent as free action when you inflict nonlethal damage

Feat.Name: Equipment Trick
Feat.ShortDescription: Use a variety of tricks related to a piece of equipment.

Feat.Name: Eschew Materials
Feat.ShortDescription: Cast spells without material components

Feat.Name: Fearsome Barricade
Feat.ShortDescription: Intimidate those who attack your allies.

Feat.Name: Field Repair
Feat.ShortDescription: Take no penalty for repairs made with improvised materials

Feat.Name: Fight On
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain temporary hit points when reduced to 0

Feat.Name: Flanking Foil
Feat.ShortDescription: Foes you strike lose their flanking bonus against you

Feat.Name: Fleet
Feat.ShortDescription: Your base speed increases by 5 feet

Feat.Name: Focused Discipline
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain temporary combat bonuses after resisting fear effects

Feat.Name: Go Unnoticed
Feat.ShortDescription: Make Stealth check against flat-footed opponents during first round of combat

Feat.Name: Great Fortitude
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 on Fortitude saves

Feat.Name: Improved Great Fortitude
Feat.ShortDescription: Once per day, you may reroll a Fortitude save

Feat.Name: Gunsmithing
Feat.ShortDescription: May create, repair, and restore firearms

Feat.Name: Hammer the Gap
Feat.ShortDescription: With a full-attack action, each hit against the same opponent deals extra damage

Feat.Name: Hero's Fortune
Feat.ShortDescription: You gain a hero point. The maximum number of hero points you can have at any one time is increased to 5.

Feat.Name: Improved Counterspell
Feat.ShortDescription: Counterspell with spell of the same school

Feat.Name: Parry Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Reflect a counterspelled spell back on its caster

Feat.Name: Improved Critical
Feat.ShortDescription: Double the threat range of one weapon

Feat.Name: Improved Initiative
Feat.ShortDescription: +4 bonus on initiative checks

Feat.Name: Improved Unarmed Strike
Feat.ShortDescription: Always considered armed

Feat.Name: Belier's Bite
Feat.ShortDescription: +1d4 bleed damage with unarmed strikes

Feat.Name: Deflect Arrows
Feat.ShortDescription: Avoid one ranged attack per round

Feat.Name: Snatch Arrows
Feat.ShortDescription: Catch one ranged attack per round

Feat.Name: Elemental Fist
Feat.ShortDescription: Deal 1d6 energy damage with an unarmed strike

Feat.Name: Improved Grapple
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on grapple attempts, no attack of opportunity

Feat.Name: Body Shield
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain cover against attacks while grappling

Feat.Name: Greater Grapple
Feat.ShortDescription: Maintain your grapple as a move action

Feat.Name: Hamatula Strike
Feat.ShortDescription: Impale opponents with grapple checks.

Feat.Name: Hamatulatsu Strike
Feat.ShortDescription: Deal more damage to foes impaled with Hamatula Strike.

Feat.Name: Perfect Strike
Feat.ShortDescription: Roll twice for unarmed strikes and take the better roll

Feat.Name: Punishing Kick
Feat.ShortDescription: Knock down or push back foes with unarmed strikes

Feat.Name: Scorpion Style
Feat.ShortDescription: Reduce target's speed to 5 ft.

Feat.Name: Gorgon's Fist
Feat.ShortDescription: Stagger a foe whose speed is reduced

Feat.Name: Medusa's Wrath
Feat.ShortDescription: Make 2 extra attacks against a hindered foe

Feat.Name: Cockatrice Strike
Feat.ShortDescription: Turn a target to stone with a critical hit

Feat.Name: Stunning Fist
Feat.ShortDescription: Stun opponent with an unarmed strike

Feat.Name: Crushing Blow
Feat.ShortDescription: Stunning Fist reduces target's AC

Feat.Name: Jawbreaker
Feat.ShortDescription: With successful Stunning Fist, you may cripple opponent's mouth

Feat.Name: Bonebreaker
Feat.ShortDescription: Deal Str or Dex damage when using Stunning Fist

Feat.Name: Neckbreaker
Feat.ShortDescription: May deal Str or Dex damage to pinned opponent

Feat.Name: Touch of Serenity
Feat.ShortDescription: Foes hit by unarmed strikes cannot attack or cast spells

Feat.Name: Intimidating Prowess
Feat.ShortDescription: Add Str to Intimidate in addition to Cha

Feat.Name: Iron WIll
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on Will saves

Feat.Name: Improved Iron Will
Feat.ShortDescription: Once per day, you may reroll a Will save

Feat.Name: Ironguts
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 on saves against nausea, sickening, and ingested poisons

Feat.Name: Ironhide
Feat.ShortDescription: +1 natural armor bonus to AC

Feat.Name: Keen Scent
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain the scent special ability

Feat.Name: Smell Fear
Feat.ShortDescription: +4 on Perception checks to detect frightened creatures

Feat.Name: Lightning Reflexes
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on Reflex saves

Feat.Name: Improved Lightning Reflexes
Feat.ShortDescription: Once per day, you may reroll a Reflex save

Feat.Name: Low Profile
Feat.ShortDescription: +1 dodge bonus to AC against ranged attacks

Feat.Name: Lucky Halfling
Feat.ShortDescription: You may roll saving throw for an ally once per day

Feat.Name: Lunge
Feat.ShortDescription: Take a -2 penalty to your AC to attack with reach

SkillFeat.Name: Magical Aptitude
SkillFeat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on Spellcraft and Use Magic Device checks

Feat.Name: Mounted Combat
Feat.ShortDescription: Avoid attacks on mount with Ride check

Feat.Name: Indomitable Mount
Feat.ShortDescription: Once per round you can substitute your Ride check for your mounts saving throw.

Feat.Name: Mounted Archery
Feat.ShortDescription: Halve the penalty for ranged attacks while mounted

Feat.Name: Mounted Shield
Feat.ShortDescription: Apply shield bonus to mount's AC

Feat.Name: Ride-By Attack
Feat.ShortDescription: Move before and after a charge attack while mounted

Feat.Name: Spirited Charge
Feat.ShortDescription: Double damage on a mounted charge

Feat.Name: Trample
Feat.ShortDescription: Overrun targets while mounted

Feat.Name: Trick Riding
Feat.ShortDescription: Automatically pass simple Ride skill checks

Feat.Name: Mounted Skirmisher
Feat.ShortDescription: Make a full attack if mount moves its speed or less

Feat.Name: Unseat
Feat.ShortDescription: Knock opponents from their mounts

Feat.Name: Nimble Moves
Feat.ShortDescription: Ignore 5 feet of difficult terrain when you move

Feat.Name: Acrobatic Steps
Feat.ShortDescription: Ignore 20 feet of difficult terrain when you move

Feat.Name: Light Step
Feat.ShortDescription: Move normal speed in difficult terrain

Feat.Name: Opening Volley
Feat.ShortDescription: Successful ranged attack grants +4 on next melee attack roll

Feat.Name: Pass for Human
Feat.ShortDescription: +10 on Disguise checks to look like a human

Feat.Name: Pass for Human (Halfling)
Feat.ShortDescription: +10 on Disguise checks to look like a human

Feat.Name: Performance Weapon Mastery
Feat.ShortDescription: All weapons you are proficient with act as if they had the performance quality

SkillFeat.Name: Persuasive
SkillFeat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on Diplomacy and Intimidate checks

Feat.Name: Betrayer
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain free attack upon successful Diplomacy skill check

Feat.Name: Point-Blank Shot
Feat.ShortDescription: +1 attack and damage on targets within 30 feet

Feat.Name: Charging Hurler
Feat.ShortDescription: May use charge rules to make thrown weapon attack

Feat.Name: Improved Charging Hurler
Feat.ShortDescription: Your target may be at any range

Feat.Name: Clustered Shots
Feat.ShortDescription: Total damage from full-round ranged attacks before applying DR

Feat.Name: Far Shot
Feat.ShortDescription: Decrease ranged penalties by half

Feat.Name: Impact Critical Shot
Feat.ShortDescription: You can bull rush on a critical hit

Feat.Name: Precise Shot
Feat.ShortDescription: No penalty for shooting into melee

Feat.Name: Bullseye Shot
Feat.ShortDescription: Spend a move action to gain a +4 bonus to next ranged attack before end of your turn.

Feat.Name: Focused Shot
Feat.ShortDescription: Add Int modifier on damage rolls with bows or crossbows

Feat.Name: Improved Precise Shot
Feat.ShortDescription: No cover or concealment chance on ranged attacks

Feat.Name: Pinpoint Targeting
Feat.ShortDescription: No armor or shield bonus on one ranged attack

Feat.Name: Rapid Shot
Feat.ShortDescription: Make one extra ranged attack

Feat.Name: Crossbow Mastery
Feat.ShortDescription: Reload crossbow as free action and make full attacks

Feat.Name: Manyshot
Feat.ShortDescription: Shoot two arrows simultaneously

Feat.Name: Snap Shot
Feat.ShortDescription: With a ranged weapon, you can take advantage of any opening in your opponent's defenses.

Feat.Name: Improved Snap Shot
Feat.ShortDescription: You threaten an additional 10 feet with Snap Shot

Feat.Name: Greater Snap Shot
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain bonus on damage and critical confirmation when using ranged weapons

Feat.Name: Stabbing Shot
Feat.ShortDescription: Use arrow as a melee attack to push enemies back

Feat.Name: Power Attack
Feat.ShortDescription: Trade melee attack bonus for damage

Feat.Name: Bloody Assault
Feat.ShortDescription: Trade melee attack bonus for bleed damage

Feat.Name: Cleave
Feat.ShortDescription: Make an additional attack if the first one hits

Feat.Name: Cleaving Finish
Feat.ShortDescription: Make additional attack if opponent is knocked out.

Feat.Name: Improved Cleaving Finish
Feat.ShortDescription: May use Cleaving Finish any number of times/round

Feat.Name: Great Cleave
Feat.ShortDescription: Make an additional attack after each attack hits

Feat.Name: Dazing Assault
Feat.ShortDescription: Trade melee attack bonus to daze opponents

Feat.Name: Death or Glory
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain +4 on attack, damage, and critical rolls vs. Large or larger opponents

Feat.Name: Furious Focus
Feat.ShortDescription: Do not take the Power Attack penalty on the first attack each round

Feat.Name: Dreadful Carnage
Feat.ShortDescription: Make a free Intimidate check when you knock down a foe

Feat.Name: Improved Bull Rush
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on bull rush attempts, no attack of opportunity

Feat.Name: Bull Rush Strike
Feat.ShortDescription: Attempt a bull rush on a successful critical hit

Feat.Name: Greater Bull Rush
Feat.ShortDescription: Enemies you bull rush provoke attacks of opportunity

Feat.Name: Improved Drag
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on drag attempts, no attack of opportunity

Feat.Name: Greater Drag
Feat.ShortDescription: Enemies you drag provoke attacks of opportunity

Feat.Name: Improved Overrun
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on overrun attempts, no attack of opportunity

Feat.Name: Charge Through
Feat.ShortDescription: Make overrun as free action while charging

Feat.Name: Elephant Stomp
Feat.ShortDescription: Combine an attack with a successful overrun.

Feat.Name: Greater Overrun
Feat.ShortDescription: Enemies you overrun provoke attacks of opportunity

Feat.Name: Improved Sunder
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on sunder attempts, no attack of opportunity

Feat.Name: Greater Sunder
Feat.ShortDescription: Damage from sunder attempts transfers to your enemy

Feat.Name: Sundering Strike
Feat.ShortDescription: Attempt a sunder attack on a successful critical hit

Feat.Name: Pushing Assault
Feat.ShortDescription: Push a foe back with a two-handed weapon

Feat.Name: Shield of Swings
Feat.ShortDescription: Reduce damage with a two handed weapon to gain a +4 shield bonus

Feat.Name: Smash
Feat.ShortDescription: Ignore 5 points of hardness when breaking an object

Feat.Name: Preferred Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Spontaneously cast a specific spell

Feat.Name: Prodigy
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain a +2 bonus on two Craft, Perform, or Profession skills

Feat.Name: Quick Draw
Feat.ShortDescription: Draw weapon as a free action

Feat.Name: Racial Heritage
Feat.ShortDescription: Affected as though both human and another race

Feat.Name: Rapid Reload
Feat.ShortDescription: Reload crossbow quickly

Feat.Name: Razortusk
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain bite attack

Feat.Name: Run
Feat.ShortDescription: Run at 5 times your normal speed

SkillFeat.Name: Self-Sufficient
SkillFeat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on Heal and Survival checks

Feat.Name: Shadow Strike
Feat.ShortDescription: Deal precision damage against targets with concealment

Feat.Name: Shared Insight
Feat.ShortDescription: Grant friendly creatures a +2 bonus on Perception checks

ArmorFeat.Name: Shield Proficiency
ArmorFeat.ShortDescription: No penalties on attack rolls when using a shield

Feat.Name: Improved Shield Bash
Feat.ShortDescription: Keep your shield bonus when shield bashing

Feat.Name: Shield Slam
Feat.ShortDescription: Free bull rush with a bash attack

Feat.Name: Saving Shield
Feat.ShortDescription: Grant shield bonus to an adjacent ally

Feat.Name: Shield Focus
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain a +1 bonus to your AC when using a shield

Feat.Name: Covering Defense
Feat.ShortDescription: Provide cover to an ally with total defense

Feat.Name: Missile Shield
Feat.ShortDescription: Deflect one ranged attack per round with shield

Feat.Name: Ray Shield
Feat.ShortDescription: Deflect one ranged touch attack per round with shield

Feat.Name: Shield Master
Feat.ShortDescription: No two-weapon penalties when attacking with a shield

Feat.Name: Bashing Finish
Feat.ShortDescription: Make a free shield bash after a critical hit

ArmorFeat.Name: Tower Shield Proficiency
ArmorFeat.ShortDescription: No penalties on attack rolls when using a tower shield

SkillFocusFeat.Name: Skill Focus
SkillFocusFeat.ShortDescription: +3 bonus on one skill (+6 at 10 ranks)

Feat.Name: Sociable
Feat.ShortDescription: Grant friendly creatures a +2 bonus on Diplomacy checks

Feat.Name: Spell Bluff
Feat.ShortDescription: Bluff other spellcasters, increasing the DC needed to identify your spell

Feat.Name: Spell Penetration
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on level checks to beat spell resistance

Feat.Name: Greater Spell Penetration
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on level checks to beat spell resistance

SkillFeat.Name: Stealthy
SkillFeat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on Escape Artist and Stealth checks

Feat.Name: Step Up
Feat.ShortDescription: Take a 5-foot step as an immediate action

Feat.Name: Following Step
Feat.ShortDescription: Move up to 10 feet as an immediate action

Feat.Name: Step Up and Strike
Feat.ShortDescription: Follow adjacent creature and attack as an immediate action

Feat.Name: Stone-Faced
Feat.ShortDescription: +4 bonus on Bluff checks to lie or conceal motives

Feat.Name: Strike Back
Feat.ShortDescription: Attack foes that strike you while using reach

Feat.Name: Taunt
Feat.ShortDescription: Demoralize opponents with Bluff instead of Intimidate

Feat.Name: Throw Anything
Feat.ShortDescription: No penalties for improvised ranged weapons

Feat.Name: Ricochet Splash Weapon
Feat.ShortDescription: Make an attack roll with a splash weapon if it misses and lands in another creature's square

Feat.Name: Toughness
Feat.ShortDescription: +3 hit points, +1 per Hit Die beyond 3

Feat.Name: Two-Weapon Fighting
Feat.ShortDescription: Reduce two-weapon fighting penalties

Feat.Name: Dorn-Dergar Master
Feat.ShortDescription: Learn to use the dwarven dorn-dergar with one hand.

Feat.Name: Double Slice
Feat.ShortDescription: Add your Str bonus to off-hand damage rolls

Feat.Name: Two-Weapon Rend
Feat.ShortDescription: Rend a foe hit by both your weapons

Feat.Name: Improved Two-Weapon Fighting
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain additional off-hand attack

Feat.Name: Improved Two-Weapon Feint
Feat.ShortDescription: Make a bluff check instead of your first attack

Feat.Name: Greater Two-Weapon Fighting
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain a third off-hand attack

Feat.Name: Two-Weapon Defense
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain +1 shield bonus when fighting with two weapons

Feat.Name: Two-Weapon Feint
Feat.ShortDescription: Forego first melee attack to feint

Feat.Name: Undermining Exploit
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain +4 insight bonus on combat maneuvers vs. opponents in rocky, difficult terrain.

Feat.Name: Vital Strike
Feat.ShortDescription: Deal twice the normal damage on a single attack

Feat.Name: Devastating Strike
Feat.ShortDescription: Deal extra damage when using Vital Strike bonus

Feat.Name: Improved Devastating Strike
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain bonus on rolls to confirm critical hits

Feat.Name: Improved Vital Strike
Feat.ShortDescription: Deal three times the normal damage on a single attack

Feat.Name: Greater Vital Strike
Feat.ShortDescription: Deal four times the normal damage on a single attack

Feat.Name: Weapon Finesse
Feat.ShortDescription: Use Dex instead of Str on attack rolls with light weapons

Feat.Name: Dervish Dance
Feat.ShortDescription: Use Dex modifier instead of Str modifier with scimitar

Feat.Name: Weapon Focus
Feat.ShortDescription: +1 bonus on attack rolls with one weapon

Feat.Name: Dazzling Display
Feat.ShortDescription: Intimidate all foes within 30 feet

Feat.Name: Gory Finish
Feat.ShortDescription: Make an intimidate check if you reduce an opponent to negative hit points

Feat.Name: Shatter Defenses
Feat.ShortDescription: Hindered foes are flat-footed

Feat.Name: Deadly Stroke
Feat.ShortDescription: Deal double damage plus 1 Con bleed

Feat.Name: Quarterstaff Mastery
Feat.ShortDescription: Use a quarterstaff one-handed

Feat.Name: Well-Prepared
Feat.ShortDescription: Retrieve a specific mundane item from your person

Feat.Name: Bouncing Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Redirect a spell that had no effect on initial target

Feat.Name: Burning Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Spell with the acid or fire descriptor deals extra damage the next round

Feat.Name: Concussive Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Spell with the sonic descriptor gains a debilitating concussive effect

Feat.Name: Dazing Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Daze creature with spell damage

Feat.Name: Disruptive Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Target of spell must make concentration check to cast a spell in the next round

Feat.Name: Echoing Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Cast a spell a second time

Feat.Name: Ectoplasmic Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Spell fully affects incorporeal and ethereal creatures

Feat.Name: Elemental Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Inflict energy damage instead of regular spell damage

Feat.Name: Empower Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Increase spell variables by 50%

Feat.Name: Enlarge Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Double spell range

Feat.Name: Extend Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Double spell duration

Feat.Name: Flaring Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Spell with the fire, light, or electricity descriptor dazzles creatures it affects

Feat.Name: Focused Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Increase save DC of spell for one target in a group

Feat.Name: Heighten Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Treat spell as a higher level

Feat.Name: Intensify Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Increase maximum damage dice by 5 levels

Feat.Name: Lingering Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Instantaneous area effect spell lasts for 1 round

Feat.Name: Maximize Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Maximize spell variables

Feat.Name: Merciful Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Spell inflicts nonlethal damage instead of lethal

Feat.Name: Persistent Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Creatures who saved against a spell must save again

Feat.Name: Piercing Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Affected spell treats creatures with SR as having an SR of 5 lower

Feat.Name: Quicken Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Cast spell as a swift action

Feat.Name: Reach Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Increase spell range to higher range category

Feat.Name: Rime Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Spell with the cold descriptor also entangles creatures if the spell damages them

Feat.Name: Selective Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Exclude targets from an area effect spell

Feat.Name: Sickening Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Sicken creature with spell damage

Feat.Name: Silent Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Cast spell without verbal components

Feat.Name: Still Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Cast spell without somatic components

Feat.Name: Thundering Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Deafen creature with spell damage

Feat.Name: Toppling Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Spell with the force descriptor knocks targets prone

Feat.Name: Widen Spell
Feat.ShortDescription: Double spell area

Feat.Name: Brutal Grappler
Feat.ShortDescription: Damage a target while grappling

Feat.Name: Coordinated Defense
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus to CMD

Feat.Name: Coordinated Maneuvers
Feat.ShortDescription: +2 bonus on combat maneuver checks

Feat.Name: Duck and Cover
Feat.ShortDescription: Take ally's result on Reflex saving throw

Feat.Name: Ensemble
Feat.ShortDescription: Nearby performers can aid your perform checks

Feat.Name: Lookout
Feat.ShortDescription: Act in surprise round if ally can act

Feat.Name: Outflank
Feat.ShortDescription: Gain +4 bonus on attack rolls when flanking

Feat.Name: Paired Opportunists
Feat.ShortDescription: +4 bonus on attacks of opportunity

Feat.Name: Precise Strike
Feat.ShortDescription: Deal +1d6 points of precision damage with melee attacks

Feat.Name: Shield Wall
Feat.ShortDescription: Increase your shield bonus to AC

Feat.Name: Shielded Caster
Feat.ShortDescription: +4 bonus on concentration checks

Feat.Name: Swap Places
Feat.ShortDescription: Switch places with an adjacent ally
